item.description:
Lisa Hall, BostonLOA member and an Abraham Hicks practice-tioner/ coach, is organizing 2 DVD screening events (on Friday, 5/29 & Saturday, 5/30) for her dear friend, Peter Beamish.

Donations will be Appreciated
(For the venue and for Peter in support of travel)

RSVP here so we'll meetup at the Hotel.


**************************************

Friends of the metaphysical, this is something you won’t want to miss!

Two mind-bending evenings.

Two mind-bending films.


Plus - Peter Beamish, the creator, director and host of these shows, will be on hand to answer your questions after each screening!


Friday Night, 8 pm: “Introducing Neale Donald Walsch – God’s Latest Scribe”


Neale Donald Walsch is the New York Times best selling author of the “Conversations With God” Series. Attend this sneak preview and feel as if you are there with Peter as he poses probing questions in this brand new film to be released in July by Hay House.


Saturday Night, 5/30: Go here for details & RSVP -
http://lawofattractio...


More INFO:

Live Interview with Peter Beamish - You Tube

Aura.ca – the full story

Neale Donald Walsch – Official Site

***************************************
REMEMBER:
RSVP here so we'll meetup at the Hotel.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Special Event: Take A Giant Step - The Director's Tour re: Neale Donald Walsch
